value:
To the Ashen Wolves, I am a mere
guardian. I could protect them, but
I could not enrich their minds.

Those who dwell in Abyss were
chased underground. But do not take
that to mean they are criminals.

Yes, I knew Jeralt. When we met,
he led the knights of the monastery.

Even if the church or the archbishop
consider the existence of Abyss a
nuisance, my conviction isn't shaken.

Do... Do you have a desire that
grips you? So strongly that you
would sacrifice everything?

I am Aelfric, a monk of the Church of
Seiros. I come bearing proof of your
tie with $Nf.

May the goddess's authority
rain down on us all, sparing
none.
As the goddess wills.
The result was not as I had hoped...

I will do my very best to
meet your expectations.

I am Aelfric, a monk of the Church of
Seiros, which has entrusted me with
the management of Abyss.

Society requires that each and
everyone has a place they belong
if they are to lead a fruitful life.$k$pTo find that place, one must start by
understanding their role and finding
support from those around them.$k$pThose who have fallen on hardship,
whatever form it may take, must also
have a place.$k$pI believe it is my duty to aid those
who have been driven underground.
I have made this my mission.$k$pI have seen that you are strong—
strong enough to make your own
place.$k$pIf one as strong as you could aid
me in creating a place for others...
Nothing would please me more.
はあっ
これで…
くっ…
まずいですね…
I will not allow it.
If you insist...
Soon...
Submit.
I have yet to...
Chuckle...

Allow me to introduce myself. I am Aelfric. The
church has granted me custodianship of Abyss.
Ah—did you require something of me?

I believe it is my sacred duty to provide a place for
those who have nowhere else to go.
She had a radiant smile...but not for me.

It is my hope that you will live a full life—
experiencing the world, fostering strong
relationships with people.
Surely there are those you wish you could return to life.

Should you ever require counsel, know that
I am here for you, always.
Well then.
Truly?
We must hurry.
